content:
To date, I haven't found a better open-source QR-code scanner for Android than "The Privacy Friendly QR Scanner". :androidalt:
It's awesome that people are building great FOSS products that can replace proprietary software! Not to say proprietary software doesn't have a place in the world, but stuff like QR-scanners etc. ought to be FOSS! :fosstodon:
https://secuso.aifb.kit.edu/english/QR_Scanner.php
